headline.main: Ferry Operator Stena Line Tests Running Ship on Methanol
headline.print_headline: Ferry Operator Stena Line Tests Running Ship on Methanol

docs.snippet: Swedish ferry operator Stena Line says it has converted one of its ships to enable it to run on methanol, testing the potential of the environmentally friendly fuel for the shipping industry....
docs.lead_paragraph: Swedish ferry operator Stena Line says it has converted one of its ships to enable it to run on methanol, testing the potential of the environmentally friendly fuel for the shipping industry.

headline.main: Review: 'Woman in Gold,' a Remarkable Story Lifelessly Told
headline.print_headline: Review: 'Woman in Gold,' a Remarkable Story Lifelessly Told

docs.snippet: "Woman in Gold" has a rich story to tell. The true account of Maria Altmann's fight to reclaim a famed Gustav Klimt painting of her aunt, "Portrait of Adele Bloch-Bauer I," first stolen by the Nazis and then appropriated by Austria after the war, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: "Woman in Gold" has a rich story to tell. The true account of Maria Altmann's fight to reclaim a famed Gustav Klimt painting of her aunt, "Portrait of Adele Bloch-Bauer I," first stolen by the Nazis and then appropriated by Austria after the war, is laced with riveting history, deep and complex emotion, and fascinating bureaucracy. Yet director Simon Curtis's rendering of Altmann's tale, though respectful and pretty, is somehow lifeless.

headline.main: McDonald's to Test All-Day Breakfast Beginning in April
headline.print_headline: McDonald's to Test All-Day Breakfast Beginning in April
